courses.name: Master of Engineering (Software)
courses.description: A professional master's degree designed to develop advanced software engineering skills with industry partnerships.
courses.career_prospects: Software Engineer, Systems Architect, Tech Lead, CTO
courses.prerequisites: Bachelor's degree in IT/CS with minimum 65% or equivalent

courses.name: Master of Business Administration
courses.description: Rotman MBA is one of the top business programs globally, focusing on integrative thinking and business innovation.
courses.career_prospects: Management Consultant, Investment Banker, Product Manager, CEO
courses.prerequisites: Bachelor's degree + 2 years work experience + GMAT/GRE

courses.name: Master of Science in Computer Science
courses.description: TUM's internationally renowned CS program covers AI, robotics, and software systems with strong industry connections.
courses.career_prospects: Software Developer, Data Scientist, ML Engineer, Research Scientist
courses.prerequisites: Bachelor's in CS or related field with strong grades

courses.name: Master of Engineering
courses.description: World-class engineering education with access to cutting-edge research facilities and Japanese industry.
courses.career_prospects: Research Engineer, Project Manager, R&D Specialist
courses.prerequisites: Bachelor's in Engineering + Japanese proficiency or TOEFL 90+

courses.name: MSc Data Science
courses.description: Intensive one-year program covering machine learning, big data analytics, and practical data science applications.
courses.career_prospects: Data Scientist, ML Engineer, Business Analyst, AI Researcher
courses.prerequisites: Bachelor's in quantitative field + programming experience

courses.name: Master of Science in Business Analytics
courses.description: Asia's leading business analytics program combining management science with data-driven decision making.
courses.career_prospects: Business Analyst, Analytics Consultant, Strategy Manager
courses.prerequisites: Bachelor's degree + quantitative background + work experience preferred
